Articles.Content:
Hello there!

I\'ve already been posting around some, but neglected to introduce myself. Shameful behavior.

I like flying games. Flight sims, space sims, that kind of thing. When I learned the Mun had been added to the game, I upgraded it from 'going to look at someday' to 'going to try it soon.' Then I learned about C7\'s pack of aviation parts and immediately grabbed the game. Please fix the donation system so I can give you some money.

My Kerbal crew are committed to always landing in a controlled, piloted fashion. They are not allowed to use parachutes. Ever. They either land like an airplane, or they crash, and a good time is had by all.

I have a Youtube Let\'s Play started here:

. I hope to document the learning process, trials and errors of getting a spaceplane to the Mun and back to Kerbal Space Center.

Looking forward to learning the game with all of you!

Welcome.

Ill go and have a look at you lets play series. I perfer flying too. I am good flyer ( Flying the unflyable) so if you want any help, just ask.

Just watched the video and it had me creasing up with laughter!

Keep up the good work and best of luck! 8)

*goes to watch part 2*

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
